General.Name: AVIC Heavy Machinery Co Ltd
General.Description: AVIC Heavy Machinery Co., Ltd. engages in forging and casting business in China. The company's forging business is involved in the production of die forgings, free forgings, isothermal forgings, rings, etc.; structural parts, such as beams, frames, joints, suspensions, and landing gears for aircraft; rotating parts, including disks and shafts for aero-engines and gas turbines; and stationary parts comprising casings and mounting edges, forgings for missile engines and rocket engines, and other civil high-end forgings. Its forging and casting products are primarily used in domestic and foreign aviation, aerospace, ships, weapons, electric power, petrochemical, railway, automobile, mining, construction machinery, and other fields. It is also involved in the research, development, and production of aerospace castings, military and civilian high-pressure plunger hydraulic pumps/motors, hydraulic pressure, radiator, and integrated system products. In addition, the company manufactures aviation environmental control accessories and civil heat exchangers, including heat exchangers, high-speed rotating machinery, lubricating oil tanks, cooling devices, and high-temperature insulation parts for hydraulic systems and lubrication systems used in construction machinery, air compressors, wind power, medical, high-speed rail, and other industries. It also exports its products to Europe, the United States, and other countries. AVIC Heavy Machinery Co., Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Guiyang, China. AVIC Heavy Machinery Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Aviation Industry Corporation of China.
General.Address: Taisheng International A3 Office Bldg, Guiyang, China, 100028
